page.title: 05FARMING _ CROPS & MACHINERY
page.content: This area is divided between dairy and mixed farming. The main crops are grass for grazing, hay and silage, small quantities of wheat, barley, oats, oil seed rape, maize, potatoes and green crops. The farmers use a lot of machinery. Four wheel drive tractors range from 50 hp. to 120 hp. with loaders for loading hay bales, manure and silage bales. 3 to 10 ton trailers are used for carting silage and corn. Also used are rotary manure spreaders, slurry tankers, fertilizer spreaders, three furrow reversible ploughs, power harrows, 40ft crop sprays, balaster rollers, push off buckrakers, gyrotedders for turning and putting up hay, and 24ft corn augers. /cont'd on Page 6.
